creator: Umniah
descriptionHtml:
Umniah is proud to present the brand-new Umniah Self-Care application to its customers! Keep all of your phone, internet and fixed line accounts in your pocket with you, wherever you go. Become independent and take control of your digital life with Umniah Self-Care!

With the Umniah Self-Care app, you can:

*CHECK YOUR LINE DETAILS - One tap on your phone, and you can see the minutes, SMSs and data you have left on your account straight from our home page. Quick and simple.

*TOP-UP - No more need to walk to a store or call a phone number to recharge your postpaid account, you can now top-up directly from your phone in just a few clicks!

*TRANSFER BALANCE - Transferring credit between phone lines has never been easier; with the Self-Care app, send balance to your family or friends in less than five minutes.

*PAY YOUR BILL - No one likes to see unpaid bills pile up; save yourself some time and take care of your bills directly from your phone!

*AND MUCH MORE - Browse Umniah’s latest products and services, locate your nearest Umniah shop, find the answers to all of your Umniah-related questions… All from a single app.

Take control of your digital life with the new Umniah Self-Care application today!


What’s New

Bill Payment:
Pay your bills directly through the application using your credit card

Special Promotions:
Find out the special promotions that are available to you

Balance transfer:
Transfer balance to your friends easily using the application

Buy bundles:
With the new application you have more bundles and packages available for you to buy.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We regularly release updates through the app, which include great new features, as well as improvements for user experience and reliability.

descriptionHtml:
Umniah is proud to present the brand-new Umniah Self-Care application to its customers! Keep all of your phone, internet and fixed line accounts in your pocket with you, wherever you go. Become independent and take control of your digital life with Umniah Self-Care!

With the Umniah Self-Care app, you can:

*CHECK YOUR LINE DETAILS - One tap on your phone, and you can see the minutes, SMSs and data you have left on your account straight from our home page. Quick and simple.

*TOP-UP - No more need to walk to a store or call a phone number to recharge your postpaid account, you can now top-up directly from your phone in just a few clicks!

*TRANSFER BALANCE - Transferring credit between phone lines has never been easier; with the Self-Care app, send balance to your family or friends in less than five minutes.

*PAY YOUR BILL - No one likes to see unpaid bills pile up; save yourself some time and take care of your bills directly from your phone!

*AND MUCH MORE - Browse Umniah’s latest products and services, locate your nearest Umniah shop, find the answers to all of your Umniah-related questions… All from a single app.

Take control of your digital life with the new Umniah Self-Care application today!


What’s New

Bill Payment:
Pay your bills directly through the application using your credit card

Special Promotions:
Find out the special promotions that are available to you

Balance transfer:
Transfer balance to your friends easily using the application

Buy bundles:
With the new application you have more bundles and packages available for you to buy.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Check out the new changes on Ugames and get the chance to win on daily and Monthly basis.
Check the latest offers on eshop with amazing gifts and discounts.
Check ‘My Offers’ sections for more special offers designed just for you.
Open your UWallet account and access most features from inside the app.

descriptionHtml:
Umniah is proud to present the brand-new Umniah Self-Care application to its customers! Keep all of your phone, internet and fixed line accounts in your pocket with you, wherever you go. Become independent and take control of your digital life with Umniah Self-Care!

With the Umniah Self-Care app, you can:

*CHECK YOUR LINE DETAILS - One tap on your phone, and you can see the minutes, SMSs and data you have left on your account straight from our home page. Quick and simple.

*TOP-UP - No more need to walk to a store or call a phone number to recharge your postpaid account, you can now top-up directly from your phone in just a few clicks!

*TRANSFER BALANCE - Transferring credit between phone lines has never been easier; with the Self-Care app, send balance to your family or friends in less than five minutes.

*PAY YOUR BILL - No one likes to see unpaid bills pile up; save yourself some time and take care of your bills directly from your phone!

*AND MUCH MORE - Browse Umniah’s latest products and services, locate your nearest Umniah shop, find the answers to all of your Umniah-related questions… All from a single app.

Take control of your digital life with the new Umniah Self-Care application today!
